titleNullable: Anime and manga data from MyAnimeList (March 2023)
descriptionNullable:
I have scrapped (almost) all anime and manga data from MyAnimeList through their API. I wanted to understand how the anime industry works in relation to the manga industry and ultimately build a model to predict upcoming anime MyAnimeList scores. So I thought might as well share this data with other anime enthusiasts here at Kaggle.

Limitation: there seem to be missing mal_ids, even though I have tried to request the API multiple times. If you're interested in completing all of the mal_ids, you can list all of the missing mal_ids from the range(0, len(mal_ids)) and request them through the MyAnimeList API.

All rights belong to MyAnimeList.
